title: Fragments, 18th century
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Howard J. Sachs and Mr. Peter G. Sachs in memory of Miss Edith L. Sachs
description: Two lengths of woven fabric: ribbons creating a diamond grid [bows at the intersections of the grid] enclosing a small floral sprig [alternate rows counterfaced] on a rust background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk. Gift of Mrs. Howard J. Sachs and Mr. Peter G. Sachs in memory of Miss Edith L. Sachs. 1978-168-16-a,b.
